<span data-ttu-id="13c91-103">Kada čitate e-poštu u Outlook.com, možete da koristite funkciju zumiranja svog pregledača da biste povećali ili smanjili tekst na ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13c91-103">When reading email in Outlook.com, you can use your browser's zoom function to make the text on your screen larger or smaller.</span></span>

2. <span data-ttu-id="13c91-108">Odaberite font ili veličinu fonta koje želite da koristite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13c91-108">Choose the font or font size you want to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="13c91-109">Ako ne vidite meni "Opcije oblikovanja" na dnu okna za pisanje, izaberite **Opcije oblikovanja**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13c91-109">If you don't see the formatting options menu at the bottom of the compose pane, select the **Formatting options**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="13c91-110">Ikonu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13c91-110">icon.</span></span>
